hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.victim.report.VictimAssociationSummary( association, ( select mailingAddress from omis.contact.domain.Contact contact inner join contact.mailingAddress mailingAddress where contact.person = victim ), ( select telephoneNumber from omis.contact.domain.TelephoneNumber telephoneNumber inner join telephoneNumber.contact contact where contact.person = victim and telephoneNumber.primary = true ), ( select count(note) from omis.victim.domain.VictimNote note inner join note.association noteAssociation where noteAssociation = association ) ) from omis.victim.domain.VictimAssociation as association inner join association.relationship as relationship inner join relationship.firstPerson as offender inner join offender.name as offenderName inner join relationship.secondPerson as victim inner join victim.name as victimName left outer join victim.identity as victimIdentity where offender = :offender order by victimName.lastName, victimName.firstName, victimIdentity.birthDate

select new omis.victim.report.VictimAssociationSummary( association, ( select mailingAddress from omis.contact.domain.Contact contact inner join contact.mailingAddress mailingAddress where contact.person = victim ), ( select telephoneNumber from omis.contact.domain.TelephoneNumber telephoneNumber inner join telephoneNumber.contact contact where contact.person = victim and telephoneNumber.primary = true ), ( select count(note) from omis.victim.domain.VictimNote note inner join note.association noteAssociation where noteAssociation = association ) ) from omis.victim.domain.VictimAssociation as association inner join association.relationship as relationship inner join relationship.firstPerson as offender inner join offender.name as offenderName inner join relationship.secondPerson as victim inner join victim.name as victimName left outer join victim.identity as victimIdentity where victim = :victim order by offenderName.lastName, offenderName.firstName, offender.offenderNumber

select new omis.victim.report.VictimAssociationSummary( victimName.lastName, victimName.firstName, victimName.middleName, ( select mailingAddress from omis.contact.domain.Contact contact inner join contact.mailingAddress mailingAddress where contact.person = victim ) ) from omis.victim.domain.VictimAssociation as association inner join association.relationship as relationship inner join relationship.secondPerson as victim inner join victim.name as victimName where association = :victimAssociation

select new omis.victim.report.VictimDocumentAssociationSummary( documentAssociation.id, document.title, document.date, name.lastName, name.firstName) from omis.victim.domain.VictimDocumentAssociation as documentAssociation inner join documentAssociation.victim as victim inner join documentAssociation.document as document inner join document.creationSignature.userAccount as userAccount inner join userAccount.user as user inner join user.name as name where victim = :victim
